name: Prismatic Sphere
description: In a world of shifting colors and levels shifting even faster, it is up to you to navigate the prismatic sphere through complex levels filled with interesting mechanics. Objects move seemingly of their own accord, and some are only active at certain times.  You must use precise movement and intelligent thinking in order to achieve victory.  Prismatic sphere features lasers, switches, moving platforms, color changing walls, and more to fully stretch the minds of its players.
